name: Brighton Clock
description:
Mid-century inspired timepiece.  Alternating wood layers create an interesting natural texture, while the carved sections enhance the play of light and shadows.

Dimensions: 22"dia x 1"D 

Brass hardware.
Battery operated clock-movement (1pc AA battery not included).

Made in Brooklyn, New York.

name: Brighton Mirror
description:
Mid-century inspired wall piece. Alternating wood layers create an interesting natural texture, while the carved sections enhance the play of light and shadows.

Dimensions: 22"dia x 1"D
High-grade Baltic birch plywood.

Made in Brooklyn, New York.

name: RAW Clock
description:
RAW Clock is made of solid maple wood.  The clock celebrates the natural beauty of wood - raw and left untreated.  The design is of an archetypal clock face, fabricated using a CNC milling machine.  The combination of natural materials and industrial technology is apparent in most of my designs.

The hope is that this piece will become a heirloom object - to be handed down from generation to generation.  

Aluminum hardware and leather strap completes the piece.
Battery operated clock-movement (1pc AA battery not included).

Dimensions: 10"dia x 1"D (24" strap)

Made in Brooklyn, New York.

name: RAW Mirror
description:
RAW Mirror is made of natural birch plywood.  The mirror frame was cut at an angle to emphasize the texture, nuances in color, and imperfections found in the layers of ply.

Aluminum hardware and leather strap completes the piece.


Dimensions: 11"W x 11"H  x 1"D (24" strap)

Made in Brooklyn, New York.
